value.stringValue: Creación Factura Escritura y sus lineas

rules.name: myRule_11
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 6 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12) AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 8 OR 9 OR 15 OR 13) AND 7 AND 14

rules.name: myRule_25
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR ( 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND 4)
rules.label: Oport. es "Reserva" y se firma el contrato de Reserva

rules.name: myRule_45
rules.label: Era reserva y contrato firmado se Cancela

formula_myRule_50
